title: Settings - Preferences( MLB App EN)
custom_preconds:
Given a user an iPhone Device which supports Dark Mode 
and has iOS At Bat installed
custom_steps:
1. Launch MLB App on iPhone if already installed on device (if not then fresh install app) 
2. Click on More Category and navigate to Settings page
3. Tap on Screen Appearance 
4. Verify the 3-way selection mode available (EN)
custom_expected:
1. App installed without any issue or Launched successfully.
2. User navigate to More Category and able to access Settings page 
3. User able to access Screen Appearance submenu 
4. User display with 3-way selection mode in EN 
Setting will be called EN Screen Appearance

Dark Mode

Light text on dark background

Light Mode

Dark text on light background 

Use Device Settings

Uses your device's Display & Brightness settings mode for light or dark appearance

title: Settings - Preferences (MLB app Spanish)
custom_preconds:
Given a user an iPhone Device which supports Dark Mode
and has iOS At Bat installed
Spanish US language set up from device Settings
custom_steps:
1.Launch MLB App on iPhone if already installed on device (if not then fresh install app)
2.Click on Mas Category and navigate to Ajustes page
3.Tap on Apariencia en Pantalla 
4.Verify the 3-way selection mode available (Spanish)
custom_expected:
1. App installed without any issue or Launched successfully.
2. User navigate to More Category and able to access Settings page
3. User able to access Screen Appearance submenu
4. User display with 3-way selection mode Spanish 
Screen Appearance:  ““Apariencia en Pantalla”

Dark Mode:  “Modo Oscuro”

Light text on dark background:  “Texto claro en fondo oscuro”

Light Mode:  “Modo Leve”

Dark text on light background:  “Texto oscuro en fondo claro”

Use device settings:  “Usar Configuraciones del Dispositivo”

Uses your device's Display & Brightness settings mode for light or dark appearance:  “Usa el modo de configuraciones Visualizador y Brillante

title: Device Settings Light Mode -  MLB App Settings Dark Mode
custom_preconds:
Given a user an iPhone Device which supports Dark Mode
and has iOS At Bat installed
EN/Spanish US language set up from device Settings
Device - Light Mode 
MLB APP - DARK MODE
custom_steps:
1.Launch MLB App on iPhone if already installed on device (if not then fresh install app)
2.Click on More/Mas Category and navigate to Settings/Ajustes page
3.Tap on Screen appearance/Apariencia en Pantalla
4.Verify the 3-way selection mode available (EN or Spanish)
5. Go to Device Setting or Set device in Light Mode 
6. Set MLB in Dark Mode from More -> Settings -> Screen Appearance -> Dark Mode 
7. Verify that The “Dark Mode” selection sets app in dark mode regardless of device settings Light mode 
8. Browse the app
custom_expected:
1. App installed without any issue or Launched successfully.
2. User navigate to More Category and able to access Settings page
3. User able to access Screen Appearance submenu
4. User display with 3-way selection mode Spanish Screen Appearance
5. User able to set device in Light Mode from Settings 
6. User able to set Dark Mode from  -> Settings -> Screen Appearance -> Dark Mode 
7. App feature should sets in dark mode regardless of device settings Light Mode 
8. App should be functional and there won't be any error or failure upon selecting Dark Mode.

title: Device Settings Dark Mode - MLB App Settings Light Mode
custom_preconds:
Given a user an iPhone Device which supports Dark Mode
and has iOS At Bat installed
EN/Spanish US language set up from device Settings
Device - Dark Mode
MLB APP - Light Mode
custom_steps:
1.Launch MLB App on iPhone if already installed on device (if not then fresh install app)
2.Click on More/Mas Category and navigate to Settings/Ajustes page
3.Tap on Screen appearance/Apariencia en Pantalla
4.Verify the 3-way selection mode available (EN or Spanish)
5. Go to Device Setting or Set device in Dark Mode
6. Set MLB in Dark Mode from More -> Settings -> Screen Appearance -> Light Mode
7. Verify that the “White Mode” selection sets app in White Mode regardless of device settings Dark mode
8. Browse the app based on Language Settings sets on Device (EN or SPANISH)
custom_expected:
1. App installed without any issue or Launched successfully.
2. User navigate to More Category and able to access Settings page
3. User able to access Screen Appearance submenu
4. User display with 3-way selection mode Spanish Screen Appearance
5. User able to set device in Dark Mode from Settings
6. User able to set Dark Mode from -> Settings -> Screen Appearance -> Light Mode
7. App feature should sets in Light mode regardless of device settings Dark Mode
8. App should be functional and there won't be any error or failure upon selecting White Mode and language should match with device language settings.

title: Device Settings Dark or Light Mode - MLB App Settings  Use Device Settings
custom_preconds:
Given a user an iPhone Device which supports Dark Mode
and has iOS At Bat installed
EN/Spanish US language set up from device Settings
Device - Light Mode or DARK MODE
MLB App - Use Device Settings
custom_steps:
1.Launch MLB App on iPhone if already installed on device (if not then fresh install app)
2.Click on More/Mas Category and navigate to Settings/Ajustes page
3.Tap on Screen appearance/Apariencia en Pantalla
4.Verify the 3-way selection mode available (EN or Spanish)
5. Go to Device Setting or Set device in Dark Mode or Light Mode
6. Set MLB app "Use Device Settings" from More -> Settings -> Screen Appearance -> Use Device Settings
7. Verify that the “Use Device Settings” honors the OS device settings for dark/light modes in the app
8. Browse the app based on Language Settings sets on Device (EN or SPANISH)
custom_expected:
1.App installed without any issue or Launched successfully.
2.User navigate to More Category and able to access Settings page
3.User able to access Screen Appearance submenu
4.User display with 3-way selection mode Spanish Screen Appearance
5.User able to set device in Dark Mode or White Mode from OS Settings
6. User able to set Use Device Settings -> Settings -> Screen Appearance -> Use Device Settings
7. App feature should honors the OS device settings for dark/light modes in the app
8. App should be functional and there won't be any error or failure upon selecting White Mode/Dark Mode and language should match with device language settings.

title: App Killed or Exited
custom_preconds:
Given a user an iPhone Device which supports Dark Mode
and has iOS At Bat installed
EN/Spanish US language set up from device Settings
Device - Light Mode or DARK MODE
MLB App - Use Device Settings
custom_steps:
1.Launch MLB App on iPhone if already installed on device (if not then fresh install app)
2.Click on More/Mas Category and navigate to Settings/Ajustes page
3.Tap on Screen appearance/Apariencia en Pantalla
4.Verify the 3-way selection mode available (EN or Spanish)
5.Go to Device Setting or Set device in Dark Mode or Light Mode
6.Set MLB app to "Dark Mode", "White Mode" or "Use Device Settings" from More -> Settings -> Screen Appearance 
7. Kill app or Exit the app
8. Relaunch the app 
9. Verify the app behavior
custom_expected:
1.App installed without any issue or Launched successfully.
2.User navigate to More Category and able to access Settings page
3.User able to access Screen Appearance submenu
4.User display with 3-way selection mode Spanish Screen Appearance
5.User able to set device in Dark Mode or White Mode from OS Settings
6.User able to choose their desired Screen appearance from MLB app Settings 
7. User able to Kill or Exit the app 
8. User able to Relaunch the app without any issue 
9. App behavior should be functional.

title: Delete and then Reinstall App
custom_preconds:
Given a user an iPhone Device which supports Dark Mode
and has iOS At Bat installed
EN/Spanish US language set up from device Settings
Device - Light Mode or DARK MODE
MLB app - honors the OS device settings for dark/light modes in the app
custom_steps:
1. Delete the existing MLB app from device 
2. Set device settings for dark/Light modes
3. Reinstall the app 
4. Verify the app Screen appearance for MLB App 
5. Verify the MLB app Screen appearance should also honors the "Use Device Settings"
custom_expected:
1.App installed without any issue and launched successfully on device
2.Deice set up with Light/Dark Modes
3.User able to Reinstall app from app Store
4.MLB app should honors the OS device settings for dark/light modes in the app
5.MLB app screen Appearance settings should be by default to "Use Device Settings"
